title: Galacta: Daughter of Galactus (2010) #1
description:
Galactus is the terror of the universe, devouring planets and
destroying civilizations as he goes—and a father to a growing
daughter! Meet GALI, daughter of the infamous planet-eater
GALACTUS and the WINNER of last year’s MARVEL ASSISTANT-
SIZED SPECTACULAR poll! Unlike her father, Gali has
formed an affection for the planet Earth, and does her best to
subsist only on invasive alien life-forms…but when her cosmic
hunger begins growing out of control, can she hold herself
back from a deadly binge? Featuring WOLVERINE, THOR,
and the FANTASTIC FOUR, this collects the original Galacta
short plus three Marvel Digital Comic Exclusive Galacta
stories from writer Adam Warren (Empowered, Gen 13) and
with stunning digital paints by artist Hector Sevilla Lujan!
One-Shot/Rated T  …$3.99
